item.text: How many years have you smoked for / have been smoking for?
Have you ever been treated for High Blood Pressure?

answer.valueString: Yes: Adult onset, treated with pills and/or insulin

item.text: How many days per week are you active at least 30 minutes?
How many days per week are you stressed?
Do you have a history of Peripheral Vascular Disease?

answer.valueString: Yes: Known plaque through calcium score, angiogram
No restrictions to what I eat
